span.span: Norfolk County Agricultural High School uniquely provides an academic and agricultural science vocational experience, with hands-on learning for passionate students from diverse communities. Supported by an inclusive community, students are prepared for college, work, or public service in their chosen career path. Students leave with the skills and confidence to succeed in all future endeavors.

span.style: font-style: italic; text-align: center; font-family: Dosis; color: rgb(79, 129, 189);
span.strong: We are work-ready. We are world-ready. We are life-ready.
